overview: Renata (Mikha Tambayong), accompanied Bejo (Bayu Skak), her cousin, goes to Bangkok to give a surprise to Krishna (Raaj Saurabh Jain), her boyfriend who has two years working there.  In Bangkok, Renata meeta with Don Glenn (Chris Laurent) who is on vacation with Quin (Ervan Naro). Seeing the beauty of Renata, Don, racer, immediately falls in love. But Don could only harbor his passion, knowing that Renata comes to Bangkok to meet up with his boyfriend.  Surprise prepared by Renata and Bejo for Krishna fails. Renata and Bejo catch Krishna who is making out with a woman. This makes Renata disappointed and heartbroken. Don feel sorry for Renata. He then tries to entertain Renata and to encourage her. It turns out that Donâ€™s efforts succeed. Renata feels happy. Don is increasingly fond of Renata.
title: Check in Bangkok
